quell.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to end a situation in which people are behaving violently or protesting, especially by using force
quell.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Police used live ammunition to quell the disturbances.
quell.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to reduce or stop unpleasant feelings such as fear, doubt, or worry
quell.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: ‘Jerry?’ she called, trying to quell the panic inside her.
